entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
